entry.title: WIND WARNING , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:12 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:15 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -8.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 02:30 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -8.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -14.1°C
Wind: WNW 64 km/h gust 75 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls ending overnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:40 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:40 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. Snow beginning overnight then changing to rain before morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening. Forecast issued 11:40 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
